name: This Universe Is Yours to Explore: An OmniPark Adventure
name_original: This Universe Is Yours to Explore: An OmniPark Adventure
description:
Explore the ruins of OmniPark, a forgotten Texan amusement park where science and reality blur in a cosmic horror adventure across vast reaches of space and time, and every decision could be your last.

Based on a short story by Ryan Clement from the Tales from OmniPark anthology (https://www.houseblackwood.net/tales-from-omnipark/).
